docs.text: capsule : gal is a 50s-ish london cockney gangster who has retired to spain .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his old associates want him for one last job and send the vicious don to give him an offer he can't refuse .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a standout performance by ben kingsley as don cannot save what is essentially a set of cliches recycled from old westerns .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: roger ebert asks in his review of sexy beast , " who would have guessed that the most savage mad-dog frothing gangster in recent movies would be played by . . .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ben kingsley ? "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: my response would be that anyone who has seen alan arkin in wait until dark , henry fonda in once upon a time in the west , or anthony hopkins in the silence of the lambs should have guessed it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they should know that the way for a film to create a really creepy sociopath is cast someone who generally plays mild , sympathetic , or even ineffectual character roles .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the same characteristics that make an actor seem gentle in most of his roles can work in his favor when a role calls for him to be fierce and vicious .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that is the principle that works for kingsley in sexy beast .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: gary " gal " dove ( played by ray winstone ) has retired from a london career of crime and is living on a luxurious villa in spain .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: life has become a routine of sunning himself and relaxing .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but his paradise is about to be shattered by a one-two-punch .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the first punch is a boulder that comes rolling down the hill next to the villa .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the second punch comes from gal's past .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: back in london gang boss teddy bass ( ian mcshane , tv's lovejoy ) is planning to break into a safety deposit room in a bank and he wants gal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he sends his most rabid henchman don logan ( ben kingsley ) to fetch gal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: don will accept any decision gal makes from " yes " to " certainly . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however , if gal says " no " don will do whatever it takes to turn it into a yes including threatening guy's ex-porn- star wife deedee ( amanda redman ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in the meantime don knows just how to get under everybody's skin .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: kingsley makes don a compact package of fury and nastiness .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there are some serious problems in louis mellis's and david scinto's script that should have been caught before filming .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when we see the actual crime we have no idea why gal was so important to its success .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: beyond an ability to use skin-diving gear , no special talents are required of him .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: any local hood could have done what gal is needed for .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: additionally the crime involves digging from a swimming pool to the bank vault , flooding the vault .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: no only could they have let the water out of the pool and avoided the complication altogether , but there is by far too much water to be accounted for by what was in the pool .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in spite of the provocative title , the story is cliched and overly familiar .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i know i have seen all the plot elements of sexy beast in old westerns like the law and jake wade .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the story is usually of the reformed outlaw , a robert taylor type , who has hung up his guns and is trying for a life of peaceful respectability .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the old gang , however , wants to do one more job with their old buddy and sends a rabid richard widmark type to go and git ? im .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is not a great plot .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in sexy beast even the plot twists have gray beards .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: perhaps the film has a little more respectability because it was made not as a western but as a stylish british gangster film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is an old plot dressed up to look new .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if the plot is old , at least the style is creative .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is director jonathan glazer's first film , but he has reputedly done some notable tv ads for guinness stout .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his style does have some unexpected touches including some very odd dream sequences .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: cinematographer ivan bird uses a lot of half lit scenes .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we see one side of a person's faces .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but the other side fades into the darkness , a sort of metaphor for the half-world these characters in-habit .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: half of everything that is happening is also kept hidden .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we yanks will have a hard time with some of the dialog .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: at least in my theater it was difficult to make out the words with the quiet speaking , the heavy accents , and the cockney language .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sexy beast is a very and familiar minor plot lent respectability in the us by being done in what is here a still somewhat novel genre , the london crime film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot may be new to british crime films , but it would be overly familiar as a western .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: further respectability comes from ben kingsley's high-powered performance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i give it a 4 on the 0 to 10 scale and a 0 on the -4 to +4 scale .
docs.label: negative
